p: Hoppitt, W. & Laland, K. N. 2008 Social Processes Influencing Learning in Animals: A Review of the Evidence. Advances in the Study of Behavior 38: 105-165; Rendell, L .; Forgaty, L. & Laland, K. N. 2010. Rogers ’paradox recast and resolved: population structure and the evolution of social learning strategies. Evolution 64: 534–548.
